name: WordPress Content Flipper
author: srinivasan

sections.description:
Just give the shortcode for flipping the content.

The following steps in given below for flipping the content.

Front side

Step1:Type the short code[flipper_front]

Step2:Type your content text or image.

Step3:Enclosing short code[/flipper_front]

Back side

Step1:Type the short code[flipper_back]
step2:Add your content text or images.
step3:Enclosing short code[/flipper_back]

There are three Parameters for setting the style in dynamic

parameter 1:width
parameter 2:height
parameter 3:bgcolor

For example

[flipper_front width=”200 height=”200″ bgcolor=”red”] your content [/flipper_front]

Note : In back content shortcode, you can set the paremeter for background color only.

parameter 1: bgcolor

For example

[flipper_back bgcolor=”red”] your content [/flipper_back]

This plugin is used to flip the any wordpress content or image.
sections.installation:
1. Upload `wp-flipper` to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Done!
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

Can I flip any wordpress content?

Yes, you can flip the any wordpress content or image in inside the shortcode.

Can I flip the content in vertical?

No, But I will option for vertical soon.

Is it support for all browsers?

It supports in IE,Firefox and Chrome.

short_description: It is very simple plugin. you can flip the wordpress content in any page or post.
